@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Create a new qooxdoo project. This will assemble the information needed to create the new project by the following ways, in order of precedence:

  1. use parameters passed to the CLI command via the options
  2. if available, retrieve the info from the given environment
  3. ask the user the missing values interactively, offering default values where available The variables needed are stored in the templates/template_vars.js file, together with some metadata. Issues: automatic determination of qooxdoo path doesn't work yet.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the names of the skeleton directories in the template folder

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
